column5: Went to the Kitchener Princess Auto today and scored big time. They were selling 50' of 3/8" rope for $3 and 50' of 1/4" for $2. I bought 8 bags. Tons of tools on sale and the big sale was trailer hitches (the full assembly) for $28 I bought one for the work truck and just finished installing it! Should have bought a few more.
Ouch!!! Thanks for sharing...better get down there and check it out...need a bar to go on my hitch
I wish we had those shops here.
Ya but you're aloud to buy alcohol at the corner store. Trade ya?
Don't worry your little self on this one lunatic. Dan was just being kind enough to give us all a heads up.
Thanks for the warning, some of us may have saved a couple of bucks on some rope. That was close.
Their $7.00 motor covers work grat as seat covers too.
